summary: An app for booking AC (air conditioning) service work

existing_features.title: Create a booking form interface where users can enter customer details (name, phone), select service type from options (installation, repair, maintenance, cleaning), choose preferred date and time, and provide service address
Display a list or table view of all AC service bookings showing customer name, service type, scheduled date/time, address, and current status with ability to update status or cancel bookings

Design a professional and clean visual theme suitable for a service booking application with a cohesive color scheme, clear typography, and intuitive layout that works well for form inputs and data displays

new_feature_requests.summary: Create booking system for AC service work

Create a backend data model to store AC service bookings with fields for customer name, contact number, service type (installation, repair, maintenance, cleaning), preferred date and time, address, and booking status
Implement backend functions to create new AC service bookings, retrieve all bookings, update booking status, and delete bookings
